parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the data source.

parameters.name: pageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The order in which to sort the results by the `status` field.

parameters.name: sorter.status
parameters.description: The order in which to sort the results by the \`status\` field.

parameters.name: srcDbName
parameters.description: The name of the source database.

parameters.name: srcTableName
parameters.description: The name of the source table.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the migration job.

parameters.name: stopped
parameters.description: Indicates whether the job is stopped.
